page.title: 08Wethersfield & Codham Mills
page.content:
{Wethersfield Mill}stopped working in 1976. It is now the home of the {Runacre Family.}The wheel has been blocked off from the river, for in the 1960's the mill started to fall into the river, which was diverted, the wall strengthened and lock gates installed . What was once a mill, is now a lovely home. This summer Dr Runacre has gone on a 6month exchange with a{New Zealand}doctor so we have his son,{Benjamin Tallon}at{Shalford {School}until December.
{Codham Mill}is owned by{Mr D. {Tabor}of{Great Codham Hall.}We believe that it is rented to an artist. The mill pool is a favourite spot for the local children who often cycle there in the summer.
